instruction: Create a template for a friendly welcome message to new customers.
output:
Dear [Name],

Welcome to [Company Name]! We hope you're ready to embark on a journey with us that's filled with adventure and exploration. 

At [Company Name] we believe that you, as our customer, are the most important part of our business, and we want to make sure you have the best possible experience. We are dedicated to providing a top-notch experience, and part of that experience is excellent customer service.

If you have any questions or concerns about our services or products, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our customer service team. We are here to make sure that you are always happy and satisfied. 

We hope you’re looking forward to getting started!

Sincerely,
[Company Name]
